sentence: What letter stands for the ocean? the letter c.
explanation: The letter c represents the speed of light in physics. It is also commonly used to denote the ocean in maps and navigation.
first_new_sentence: The letter c is the third letter of the English alphabet.
second_new_sentence: Scientists study the properties of the ocean, often using the letter c to represent specific oceanographic measurements.
